thread.title: You’re Gonna Want Deepika Padukone’s Manicure STAT!
thread.title_full: You’re Gonna Want Deepika Padukone’s Manicure STAT!

author: Natasha Patel
title: You’re Gonna Want Deepika Padukone’s Manicure STAT!
text:
A post shared by Deepika Padukone (@deepikapadukone) on Mar 25, 2017 at 11:14am PDT 
Say hello to your summer manicure courtesy Deepika Padukone . Yup, you heard it right. We’re in dire NEED of Ms. Padukone’s new manicure! Side-tracking from the usual outfit inspiration she so fiercely hands over to us, Deepika’s now our new beauty on duty. She took to Instagram with a picture of her hand with a caption that read “ ! 💅🏽👄💄”. 
indeed—We’re totally lusting after this rainbow-inspired manicure that’s simple, colourful and most of all Deepika-worthy! 
What do you guys think? Would you try this mani? 0
